item.title: Osmosis IRL
item.description: Osmosis Osmosis is term all of us come across during our schooling days. In biology, osmosis is the movement of water molecules from a solution with a high concentration of water molecules to a solution with a lower concentration of water molecules, through a cell’s partially permeable membrane. Water purification through reverse osmosis is one of the popular application in our day to day life. Do we see anything similar to Osmosis in real life?
